attributes.action: Grant EU citizens with UK Settled Status the right to vote in elections
attributes.background: EU Citizens legally resident in the UK can now apply for Settled Status, which should guarantee their rights in the UK once we have left the EU. They make a significant contribution to our society and their lives will be impacted by the choices of any future UK Government, so should be represented.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/278051
